Package org.jfree.chart.entity

Class XYItemEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jfree.chart.entity.ChartEntity
      • org.jfree.chart.entity.XYItemEntity

  • public class XYItemEntity
extends ChartEntity
    A chart entity that represents one item within an XYPlot.
